video_prompt: The video shows a cartoon-style girl standing in front of a green chalkboard, holding a test paper and speaking to the class. She is wearing a blue jacket with white sleeves and yellow stars on the shoulders. The background includes a wooden desk with a few items on it, including a box and a book. The girl is speaking about the test paper, saying that it is not difficult and hoping that everyone can get a good score.

speech_prompt.speaker: the girl
speech_prompt.text: The test paper this time is not difficult, I hope everyone can get a good score.
